verses.verse: <S%G2532>And<s%> there <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G32>angels<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G2192>had<s%> the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G5357>vials<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2980>talked<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G1700>me<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%> unto <S%G3427>me<s%>, Come <S%G1204>hither<s%>; I will <S%G1166>shew<s%> unto <S%G4671>thee<s%> the <S%G2917>judgment<s%> of the <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G4204>whore<s%> that <S%G2521>sitteth<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G5204>waters<s%>:

<S%G3326>With<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> the <S%G935>kings<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth<s%> have committed <S%G4203>fornication<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2730>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth<s%> have been made <S%G3184>drunk<s%> <S%G1537>with<s%> the <S%G3631>wine<s%> of <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G4202>fornication<s%>.

<S%G2532>So<s%> he <S%G667>carried<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%> <S%G667>away<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4151>spirit<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2048>wilderness<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> I <S%G1492>saw<s%> a <S%G1135>woman<s%> <S%G2521>sit<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> a scarlet <S%G2847>coloured<s%> <S%G2342>beast<s%>, full <S%G1073>of<s%> <S%G3686>names<s%> of <S%G988>blasphemy<s%>, <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G2776>heads<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1176>ten<s%> <S%G2768>horns<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> the <S%G1135>woman<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G4016>arrayed<s%> in <S%G4209>purple<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> scarlet <S%G2847>colour<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5558>decked<s%> with <S%G5557>gold<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5093>precious<s%> <S%G3037>stones<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3135>pearls<s%>, <S%G2192>having<s%> a <S%G5552>golden<s%> <S%G4221>cup<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G5495>hand<s%> full <S%G1073>of<s%> <S%G946>abominations<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G168>filthiness<s%> of <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G4202>fornication<s%>:

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G3359>forehead<s%> was a <S%G3686>name<s%> <S%G1125>written<s%>, <S%G3466>MYSTERY<s%>, <S%G897>BABYLON<s%> THE <S%G3173>GREAT<s%>, THE <S%G3384>MOTHER<s%> OF <S%G4204>HARLOTS<s%> <S%G2532>AND<s%> <S%G946>ABOMINATIONS<s%> OF THE <S%G1093>EARTH<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> I <S%G1492>saw<s%> the <S%G1135>woman<s%> <S%G3184>drunken<s%> <S%G1537>with<s%> the <S%G129>blood<s%> of the <S%G40>saints<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1537>with<s%> the <S%G129>blood<s%> of the <S%G3144>martyrs<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> when I <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G846>her<s%>, I <S%G2296>wondered<s%> with <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G2295>admiration<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> the <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G3427>me<s%>, <S%G1302>Wherefore<s%> didst thou <S%G2296>marvel<s%>? <S%G1473>I<s%> will <S%G2046>tell<s%> <S%G4671>thee<s%> the <S%G3466>mystery<s%> of the <S%G1135>woman<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> of the <S%G2342>beast<s%> that <S%G941>carrieth<s%> <S%G846>her<s%>, <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G2192>hath<s%> the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G2776>heads<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1176>ten<s%> <S%G2768>horns<s%>.

The <S%G2342>beast<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> thou <S%G1492>sawest<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3195>shall<s%> <S%G305>ascend<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> the bottomless <S%G12>pit<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5217>go<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G684>perdition<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> they that <S%G2730>dwell<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G1093>earth<s%> shall <S%G2296>wonder<s%>, <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G3686>names<s%> <S%G1125>were<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1125>written<s%> <S%G1909>in<s%> the <S%G975>book<s%> of <S%G2222>life<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G2602>foundation<s%> of the <S%G2889>world<s%>, when they <S%G991>behold<s%> the <S%G2342>beast<s%> that <S%G3748%G2258>was<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%>, and <S%G2539>yet<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> there <S%G1526>are<s%> <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G935>kings<s%>: <S%G4002>five<s%> are <S%G4098>fallen<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%>, and the <S%G243>other<s%> <S%G2064>is<s%> not <S%G3768>yet<s%> <S%G2064>come<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> he <S%G2064>cometh<s%>, <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G3306>continue<s%> a short <S%G3641>space<s%>.

<S%G3778>These<s%> shall make <S%G4170>war<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> the <S%G721>Lamb<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G721>Lamb<s%> shall <S%G3528>overcome<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>: <S%G3754>for<s%> he <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> of <S%G2962>lords<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G935>King<s%> of <S%G935>kings<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> they that are <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> are <S%G2822>called<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1588>chosen<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4103>faithful<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> the <S%G1176>ten<s%> <S%G2768>horns<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> thou <S%G1492>sawest<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> the <S%G2342>beast<s%>, <S%G3778>these<s%> shall <S%G3404>hate<s%> the <S%G4204>whore<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> shall <S%G4160>make<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G2049>desolate<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1131>naked<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> shall <S%G5315>eat<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G4561>flesh<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2618>burn<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G4442>fire<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> hath <S%G1325>put<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G2588>hearts<s%> to <S%G4160>fulfil<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1106>will<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G4160%G3391%G1106>agree<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G932>kingdom<s%> unto the <S%G2342>beast<s%>, <S%G891>until<s%> the <S%G4487>words<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> shall be <S%G5055>fulfilled<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> the <S%G1135>woman<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> thou <S%G1492>sawest<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> that <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G4172>city<s%>, <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G2192%G932>reigneth<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> the <S%G935>kings<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth<s%>.
